events.name: West Ham United at Tottenham Hotspur

headlines.description: West Ham have delivered a blow to Tottenham's top four hopes, as Michail Antonio's second half strike gave them a 1-0 victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: West Ham inflict first Spurs loss at new stadium

headlines.description: Everton's hopes of finishing in seventh and a potential Europa League spot suffered a blow as they were held to a 0-0 draw by Crystal Palace.
headlines.shortLinkText: Everton held to goalless draw at Palace

headlines.description: Ryan Babel struck a potentially deadly blow to Cardiff's survival chances with a stunning 25-yard strike that secured Fulham a 1-0 win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Babel strike leaves Cardiff on brink of relegation

headlines.description: Southampton secured their Premier League status for another year after a thrilling 3-3 home draw with Bournemouth on Saturday as Cardiff City lost.
headlines.shortLinkText: Saints stay up after thrilling draw with Bournemouth

headlines.description: Wolves got some measure of revenge for a stinging FA Cup defeat by Watford earlier this month by beating them 2-1 in a lively Premier League clash.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves beat Watford to avenge Cup heartbreak

events.name: Newcastle United at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion boosted their chances of staying in the Premier League after battling to a 1-1 draw with Newcastle United..
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton boost survival hopes with Newcastle draw
